LONGTEXTS.cdb_op_context_txt: Operations that should be offered within an enterprise search result table.
Operations that should be offered within the operation catalog of the masks used by the operation CDB_Export.
Operations that should be offered within the operation catalog that is displayed when the user defines a new favourite.
Operations that should be offered within the operation catalog of the masks used by the operations CDB_ShowObjectUrl and CDB_ShowClassUrl.
Operations that should be offered in eLink applications without own operation context definition.
